query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS student_merchandise (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  studentId INT NOT NULL,
  itemId INT NOT NULL,
  size VARCHAR(20),
  pricePaid INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  fulfillmentStatus ENUM('pending', 'handed_out', 'confirmed', 'disputed') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  handedOutAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  handedOutBy INT NULL,
  confirmedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  confirmationMethod ENUM('sms', 'email', 'in_person') NULL,
  confirmationToken VARCHAR(255),
  confirmationTokenExpiry TIMESTAMP NULL,
  disputeReason TEXT,
  disputedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_student (studentId),
  INDEX idx_item (itemId),
  INDEX idx_status (fulfillmentStatus)
)

  fulfillmentStatus ENUM('pending', 'handed_out', 'confirmed', 'disputed') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,

  confirmationMethod ENUM('sms', 'email', 'in_person') NULL,
  confirmationToken VARCHAR(255),
  confirmationTokenExpiry TIMESTAMP NULL,
  disputeReason TEXT,
  disputedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_student (studentId),
  INDEX idx_item (itemId),
  INDEX idx_status (fulfillmentStatus)
)
